General.Name: Chrysos Corp Ltd
General.Description: Chrysos Corporation Limited engages in the development and supply of mining technology. It offers PhotonAssay, a technology for analysis of gold, silver, copper, and other elements. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Adelaide, Australia.
